citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 on
08/19/2014.
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process. The
licensee is in traveling status and needs to send in an updated itinerary to the eastern regional office.
